Seasons Of Code

Scilab-Julia Interface    • Shamika Mohanan   

WnCC - Seasons of Code

Seasons of Code is a programme launched by WnCC along the lines of the Google Summer of Code. It provides one with an opprtunity to learn and participate in a variety of interesting projects under the mentorship of the very best in our institute.

  • Learn More

  • Remote Triggered Virtual Lab

  • Game-playing AI agents
  • SIFT
  • Panorama in Cam-Scanner
  • Run - Treasure Hunt
  • Poisson Solver with Image Editing
  • Adaboost
  • Blind Source Separation

Scilab-Julia Interface

• Shamika Mohanan   
• Development

Application Procedure: Submit a proposal here
Contact the Mentor: Join the FOSSEE Slack team using the iitb.ac.in email address.
Stipend: INR 10000

Create an interface that can call any Julia function from Scilab console and displays the output of the Julia function on Scilab console.

Applicant profile:

The applicant should- - Have excellent coding skills in C and C++ - Know how to call functions from external libraries in C/C++ code - Know how to compile C/C++ code by linking against external libraries

Suggested reading:

  • Scilab API
  • Embedding Julia in C

The Web and Coding Club

We are the coding community of IIT Bombay. WnCC is one of the biggest clubs of IIT Bombay. We believe that every individual should know how to code. Under the aegis of STAB, we carry forward our vision of propagating the enthusiasm for coding in our institute.
